description: A twist to the original quick and easy.
name: Easy Chicken Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, thick sliced cook on the bbq or fry pan to colour
1 cup pumpkin, boiled, diced or bbq cooked is best
1 cup mushrooms, sliced pan fried or bbq cooked
1 capsicum, cut into very fine strips
4 rasher bacon, pan fried or bbq cooked
2 tomatoes pan fried, or bbq cooked then diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan add the pasta sauce and canned tomato soup, I find the canned soup addition gives tomato pasta sauces a rich glaze colour.

Simmer together for 10 mins Now you can add extra garlic and your a dash of your favourite herbs. I love adding Italian dried mixed herbs i found some online that have roasted capsicum and roasted dried garlic flakes. It's amazing.
Either pan fry all the other ingredients or cook them the day before on a bbq. Set aside. Keep warm ready to sprinkle on top of the pasta.
When ready to serve. boil the pasta. Drain. Just before serving add to the pasta sauce and the chopped woolies chicken. Warm up but don't over boil.
Put the pasta onto hot plates then pour over the hot pasta chicken sauce, or mix the pasta with the sauce together before putting onto plates or a platter.

Sprinkle all the other ingredients on top. I have just used base ingredients you can go wild and sprinkle with soft feta cheese, anchovies or fresh basil. You can also add more or less pasta sauce, or chicken.
